response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This remarkable item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an even greater asset in your hands. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which we believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth to you stands at $1,200,000. We understand the importance of making a deal that satisfies both parties, and we hope this proposal aligns with your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
